alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Powell and Estill Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richmond, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winston, Blackburn and Harris Ferry around 455 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rice Station, Kings Station, Witt, Fox, Jinks, Calloway Crossing, Weedon, Sandhill, West Irvine, Wiseman Crossing Station, Wisemantown, South Irvine, Station Camp, Iron Mound, Palmer, Irvine, Ravenna, North Irvine, Hargett, Doe Creek, Kimbrell, Cottage Furnace, Willow Tree, Hardwick, Cow Creek, Pitts, Vaughns Mill, Pryse, Spout Springs, Texola and Shade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
